subject: Device removed
body:
Dear {{{user.preferredName}}} {{{user.familyName}}},

 A device, {{#if event.friendlyName}}"{{{event.friendlyName}}}" {{/if}}was removed from your online banking on {{ formatDate event.created 'dd-MMMM-yyyy \'at\' HH:mm:ss z' 'en' 'US/Eastern' }}.

If this was you:

	All done! The device is now removed.


If you did not want to remove this device:


	You can go to Backbase and add it again.


If this wasn't you:
	Change your password right away, and check your account for activity
	Add the device again to your online banking


Regards, 
Backbase Bank
